title: Drawing, "Floor Plan, for Stage Set", March 1925
medium: Graphite and crayon on graph paper
markings: Stamped in black ink, upper left: THIS DRAWING IS MY PERSONAL PROPERTY / AND MUST BE RETURNED TO ME / HENRY DREYFUSS
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right: 1st drawing Oct. 1924 / this drawing March 1925.
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Plan showing different rooms of a house.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Floor Plan, for Stage Set", March 1925.
March 1925. Graphite and crayon on graph paper. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-116.
